00054   typedef std::map<simtime_t, std::multimap<simtime_t, airframe_ptr_t> > AirFrameMatrix;
00055 
00056   struct c_min_start_time_fctr {
00057     bool operator() (const AirFrameMatrix::value_type& a, const AirFrameMatrix::value_type& b) {
00058       return a.second.key_comp()(a.second.begin()->first, b.second.begin()->first);
00059     }
00060   };
00084   template<typename C, typename ItMatrix = typename C::const_iterator, typename ItSubMatrix = typename C::mapped_type::const_iterator>
00085   class BaseIntersectionIterator
00086   {
00087   public:
00088     typedef typename ItSubMatrix::value_type value_type;
00089     typedef typename ItSubMatrix::reference  reference;
00090     typedef typename ItSubMatrix::pointer    pointer;
00091 
00092     typedef BaseIntersectionIterator<C, ItMatrix, ItSubMatrix> iterator;
00093 
00094     typedef std::bidirectional_iterator_tag iterator_category;
00095     typedef ptrdiff_t                       difference_type;
00096 
00097   protected:
00098     friend class ChannelInfo;
00099     typedef BaseIntersectionIterator<C, ItMatrix, ItSubMatrix> _Self;
00100     //typedef _Rb_tree_node_base::_Const_Base_ptr _Base_ptr;
00101     //typedef const _Rb_tree_node<_Tp>*           _Link_type;
00102 
00104     C* intervals;
00105 
00107     simtime_t_cref from;
00108 
00110     simtime_t_cref to;
00111 
00113     ItMatrix endIt;
00114 
00116     ItSubMatrix startIt;
00117     ItSubMatrix startItEnd;
00118 
00123       _Self& jumpToNextValid(ItMatrix endItEnd)
00124       {
00125       for (; endIt != endItEnd; startIt = endIt->second.begin()) {
00126         // while there are entries left at the current end-time
00127         if (startIt != startItEnd) {
00128           // check if this entry fulfilles the intersection condition
00129           // 2 (condition 1 is already fulfilled in the constructor by
00130           // the start-value of the end-time-iterator)
00131           return *this;
00132         }
00133         if (++endIt != endItEnd) {
00134           startItEnd = endIt->second.upper_bound(to);
00135         }
00136       }
00137 
00138       intervals = NULL;
00139       return *this;
00140       }
00141   public:
00146     BaseIntersectionIterator(C* airFrames, simtime_t_cref from, simtime_t_cref to) :
00147       intervals(airFrames), from(from), to(to), endIt(), startIt(), startItEnd()
00148     {
00149       // begin at the smallest end-time-entry fulfilling the intersection
00150       // condition 1
00151       if (intervals) {
00152         endIt = intervals->lower_bound(from);
00153         if(endIt != intervals->end()) {
00154           startIt    = endIt->second.begin();
00155           startItEnd = endIt->second.upper_bound(to);
00156           jumpToNextValid(intervals->end());
00157         }
00158         else {
00159           intervals = NULL;
00160           startIt   = startItEnd;
00161         }
00162       }
00163       else {
00164         startIt = startItEnd;
00165       }
00166       //we are already pointing at the first unchecked interval
00167     }
00168     BaseIntersectionIterator(const iterator& __it) :
00169       intervals(__it.intervals), from(__it.from), to(__it.to), endIt(__it.endIt), startIt(__it.startIt),  startItEnd(__it.startItEnd)
00170     { }
00171 
00172     reference
00173       operator*() const
00174     {
00175       if(intervals == NULL || endIt == intervals->end() || startIt == startItEnd)
00176         return NULL;
00177       return startIt.operator*();
00178     }
00179 
00180     pointer
00181       operator->() const
00182     {
00183       if(intervals == NULL || endIt == intervals->end() || startIt == startItEnd)
00184         return NULL;
00185       return startIt.operator->();
00186     }
00187 
00190     _Self&
00191     operator++()
00192     {
00193       if (!intervals)
00194         return *this;
00195 
00196       const ItMatrix endItEnd = intervals->end();
00197       if(endIt == endItEnd) {
00198         intervals = NULL;
00199         return *this;
00200       }
00201 
00202       if (startIt != startItEnd)
00203         ++startIt;
00204 
00205       return jumpToNextValid(endItEnd);
00206     }
00207 
00210     _Self
00211     operator++(int)
00212       {
00213       _Self __tmp = *this;
00214       ++(*this);
00215       return __tmp;
00216       }
00217 
00220       bool
00221       operator==(const _Self& __x) const
00222       {
00223         if (intervals == NULL) {
00224           if (__x.intervals == NULL)
00225             return true;
00226           return (__x.endIt == __x.intervals->end() || __x.startIt == __x.startItEnd); // we have no next element
00227         }
00228         if (__x.intervals == NULL) {
00229           return (endIt == intervals->end() || startIt == endIt->second.end()); // we have no next element
00230         }
00231         if( (endIt == intervals->end() && __x.endIt == __x.intervals->end()) || (startIt == startItEnd && __x.startIt == __x.startItEnd) )
00232           return true;
00233         return intervals == __x.intervals && from == __x.from && to == __x.to && endIt == __x.endIt && startIt == __x.startIt && startItEnd == __x.startItEnd;
00234       }
00235 
00238       bool
00239       operator!=(const _Self& __x) const
00240       { return !(*this == __x); }
00241   };

00245                    AirFrameMatrix::const_iterator,
00246                    AirFrameMatrix::mapped_type::const_iterator> const_iterator;

00249   const static const_iterator cConstItEnd;
00250 
00256   const_iterator end() const {
00257     return cConstItEnd;
00258   }
00259 
00261   typedef BaseIntersectionIterator<AirFrameMatrix,
00262                    AirFrameMatrix::iterator,
00263                    AirFrameMatrix::mapped_type::iterator> iterator;
00264 
00266   const static iterator cItEnd;
00272   iterator end() {
00273     return cItEnd;
00274   }
00275 
00286   void erase(const iterator& __position) {
00287     assert(__position.endIt   != __position.intervals->end());
00288     assert(__position.startIt != __position.startItEnd);
00289 
00290     //erase AirFrame from list
00291     __position.endIt->second.erase(__position.startIt);
00292 
00293     //check if we deleted the only entry in the list
00294     if(__position.endIt->second.empty()) {
00295       __position.intervals->erase(__position.endIt); //delete list from map
00296     }
00297   }

00413   void checkAndCleanFrom(simtime_t_cref start) {
00414     //nothing to do
00415     if(inactiveAirFrames.empty())
00416       return;
00417 
00418     //take last ended inactive airframe as end of interval
00419     checkAndCleanInterval(start, inactiveAirFrames.rbegin()->first);
00420   }

00469   {
00470     return findEarliestInfoPoint(returnTimeIfEmpty);

00472 
00487   void startRecording(simtime_t_cref start)
00488   {
00489     // clean up until old record start
00490     if(recordStartTime > -1) {
00491       recordStartTime = start;
00492       checkAndCleanInterval(0, recordStartTime);
00493     } else {
00494       recordStartTime = start;
00495     }
00496   }
00497 
00504   void stopRecording()
00505   {
00506     if(recordStartTime > -1) {
00507       simtime_t old = recordStartTime;
00508       recordStartTime = -1;
00509       checkAndCleanFrom(old);
00510     }
00511   }
00512 
00517   bool isRecording() const
00518   {
00519     return recordStartTime > -1;
00520   }
00521 
00526   bool isChannelEmpty() const {
00527     assert(recordStartTime != -1
00528          || activeAirFrames.empty() == airFrameStarts.empty());
00529 
00530     return airFrameStarts.empty();
00531   }
